title: Spacious 3 rooms + bath.  HUGE LIVROOM, C-AIR, ET AL
neighborhood: Cambridge line at Private Way, Belmont
posting_body: ['Spacious 3 rooms + bath brings much to the table.', 'Seventeen foot living room adjacent to 13 feet of glass (glass door sliders).', 'Open lay out.', 'Fab newer carpeting.', 'Neutral colored walls.', 'New(er) and complete list of appliances; refrigerator, dishwasher, disposal, electric stove with hood, plenty of cabinets, tiled kitchen and bath, over sized closets, et al.', "Panoramic views, the greenest you'll see--all this at exclusive private way.", 'In bldg laundry.', 'Half fee prop.', 'Modest 2 months in all, at approval, required to secure it.', 'Got it all !', 'NO PETS please.', 'Up to 2 parking off street.', 'Start date is August 5 to September 1 latest.', '1 year term at a time.', 'Reduced 1/2 fee prop.', 'CHALLENGES COMPARISON !', 'Call John Lambergs1, Ingram Realty']
